Name: Globe Rush
About the game: Roam the globe in this tricky rhythm-based platformer! • 10 Destinations with unique soundtracks • Different challenges on each location • Style your character with thousands of clothes combinations • Jump, fly and glide on your way to your destination • Collect all coins and don’t forget to bring souvenirs!
